nodes.bodyText: This means you can't call this method to clear the expiration, right?  Is there another way to preserve the previous method signature and still allow for clearing the expiration?

That's a good point. Just tested out sending null with Postman and the API doesn't accept it. Also tried an empty string and Null and no expires_at field. All options do not clear the expires_at field. So I think we may not have to have to allow the user to pass in null.
